languages.text: "Если это шутка — то я не понял. А если вы серьезно... После случившегося Администратум применит суровые меры к этому миру-рассаднику колдовских извращений. Начинайте завидовать участи старшего брата, госпожа губернатор".

"If this is a joke, I'm missing the punchline. And if you are being serious... After what happened, the Administratum is going to take serious steps against the hotbed of perverse sorcery that this world has become. You may want to begin envying your older brother his fate, Governor."
languages.original_text: "Если это шутка — то я не понял. А если вы серьезно... После случившегося Администратум применит суровые меры к этому миру-рассаднику колдовских извращений. Начинайте завидовать участи старшего брата, госпожа губернатор".

You may want to begin envying your older brother his fate, Governor."

languages.text: “如果这是个玩笑，那我可能没太找到笑点。如果你是认真的……发生了这么多事情之后，内政部一定会采取措施，严肃处理这个已经沦为邪恶巫术温床的世界。或许你会羡慕你哥哥的命运，总督。”
languages.original_text: "If this is a joke, I'm missing the punchline. And if you are being serious... After what happened, the Administratum is going to take serious steps against the hotbed of perverse sorcery that this world has become. You may want to begin envying your older brother his fate, Governor."

traits.locale_text: “如果这是个玩笑，那我可能没太找到笑点。如果你是认真的……发生了这么多事情之后，内政部一定会采取措施，严肃处理这个已经沦为邪恶巫术温床的世界。或许你会羡慕你哥哥的命运，总督。”

languages.text: 「もしこれがジョークなら、パンチラインを聞き逃したようだ。もしこれが本気なら…何かが起こった後で、行政局はこの惑星の邪悪な魔術の温床に対して真剣に対処せざるを得なくなるだろう。総督、お前は兄の運命を羨ましく思うことになるかもしれないぞ」
languages.original_text: "If this is a joke, I'm missing the punchline. And if you are being serious... After what happened, the Administratum is going to take serious steps against the hotbed of perverse sorcery that this world has become. You may want to begin envying your older brother his fate, Governor."

traits.locale_text: 「もしこれがジョークなら、パンチラインを聞き逃したようだ。もしこれが本気なら…何かが起こった後で、行政局はこの惑星の邪悪な魔術の温床に対して真剣に対処せざるを得なくなるだろう。総督、お前は兄弟の運命を羨ましく思うことになるかもしれないぞ」

languages.text: «Si es una broma, no le veo la gracia. Y si lo dice en serio... Después de lo sucedido, el Administratum tomará medidas drásticas contra la cuna de brujería en que se ha convertido este planeta. Tal vez deba envidiar la suerte que ha corrido su hermano mayor».
languages.original_text: "If this is a joke, I'm missing the punchline. And if you are being serious... After what happened, the Administratum is going to take serious steps against the hotbed of perverse sorcery that this world has become. You may want to begin envying your older brother his fate, Governor."

traits.locale_text: «Si es una broma, no le veo la gracia. Y si lo dice en serio... Después de lo sucedido, el Administratum tomará medidas drásticas contra la cuna de brujería en que se ha convertido este planeta. Tal vez deba envidiar la suerte que ha corrido su hermano mayor».

languages.text: "Bu bir şakaysa anlamadığımı söyleyebilirim. Ciddiyse de... Olanlardan sonra Administratum, bu dünyanın dönüştüğü kâfirce sahirlik yuvasına karşı ciddi adımlar atacaktır. Kendinizi ağabeyinizin kaderine gıpta ederken bulabilirsiniz Vali Hanım."
languages.original_text: "If this is a joke, I'm missing the punchline. And if you are being serious... After what happened, the Administratum is going to take serious steps against the hotbed of perverse sorcery that this world has become. You may want to begin envying your older brother his fate, Governor."

traits.locale_text: "Bu bir şakaysa anlamadığımı söyleyebilirim. Ciddiyse de... Olanlardan sonra Administratum, bu dünyanın dönüştüğü kâfirce sahirlik yuvasına karşı ciddi adımlar atacaktır. Kendinizi ağabeyinizin kaderine gıpta ederken bulabilirsiniz Vali Hanım."

languages.text: « Si c'est une blague, il manque la chute. Et si vous êtes sérieuse... Après ce qu'il s'est passé, l'Administratum va prendre des mesures draconiennes contre le foyer de sorcellerie perverse qu'est devenu ce monde. Vous risquez d'envier le sort de votre frère aîné, gouverneure. »
languages.original_text: "If this is a joke, I'm missing the punchline. And if you are being serious... After what happened, the Administratum is going to take serious steps against the hotbed of perverse sorcery that this world has become. You may want to begin envying your older brother his fate, Governor."

traits.locale_text: « Si c'est une blague, il manque la chute. Et si vous êtes sérieuse... Après ce qu'il s'est passé, l'Administratum va prendre des mesures draconiennes contre le foyer de sorcellerie perverse qu'est devenu ce monde. Vous risquez d'envier le sort de votre frère aîné, gouverneure. »

languages.text: "Falls das ein Witz sein soll, verstehe ich die Pointe nicht. Und falls Ihr es ernst meint ... Nach allem, was passiert ist, wird das Administratum entschlossen gegen die Brutstätte abnormer Hexerei vorgehen, zu der diese Welt geworden ist. Vielleicht solltet Ihr schon mal Euren älteren Bruder um sein Schicksal beneiden, Gouverneurin."
languages.original_text: "If this is a joke, I'm missing the punchline. And if you are being serious... After what happened, the Administratum is going to take serious steps against the hotbed of perverse sorcery that this world has become. You may want to begin envying your older brother his fate, Governor."
